about_the_game:
🌌 Dive into the terror that lurks in the shadows!

Prepare for a chilling experience in Siren's Well, a Survival Horror game that blends suspense, adrenaline, and the vibes of 80s slasher films. Venture into the depths of the Broken Paradise Asylum, where two friends, Scarlett and Ravenna, confront their worst nightmares in a place cursed by ancient Mesopotamian gods.



🕵️‍♀️ Two Stories, Four Scenarios

Step into a world of mystery with ORIGINAL NIGHTMARE and THE OTHER SIDE, where your choices shape the fate of the heroines. Each scenario offers unique encounters, survival challenges, and the terrifying Lunatics, insane patients who have taken over the asylum. Face relentless enemies and defeat bosses in epic battles that will test your skills and courage!



📸 Capture the Ghosts

Use your smartphone to document the specters haunting the asylum. This is the only way to defeat them and uncover the mysteries of the place. But beware! Firearms will be your allies against the Lunatics, who have become the true face of terror.



🔫 Varied Arsenal

Choose from a range of weapons, such as handguns, shotguns, and even grenade launchers. Each character has unique abilities and a distinct approach to confronting the horror, ensuring that every playthrough offers a fresh and terrifying experience.



🩸 Boss Transformations

Prepare for unexpected challenges as bosses transform during combat, providing a dynamic and terrifying gameplay experience!



🗓️ Event Date: September 28, 2008

Relive the fateful day when Scarlett and Ravenna decided to explore the Broken Paradise Asylum. What begins as an intriguing adventure quickly turns into an indescribable nightmare. Will you have the courage to uncover the dark secrets waiting within the asylum?



🌟 Unravel the mysteries and face your fears in Siren's Well!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may not be suitable for all audiences. It contains intense elements, including frequent violence, optional nudity in all unlockable outfits, and the depiction of legal drug use. Prepare for a thrilling experience filled with horror, dark themes, and mature content.
